entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:59 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
